(4 months)

Worked as an SDE Intern in the Kindle Fire Launcher team and implemented a new Device metrics
 service for next generation kindle devices and was in charge of seeing end to end development
 and data propagation. Was also able to work on implementing high level operational metrics for
 the devices. The design was particularly considerate of battery restrictions and ensuring device
 performance is not affected.
